content.rendered:
SALES SPECIALIST

Alli grew up in Louisville, Kentucky, and graduated from Western Kentucky University with a degree in marketing and sales.

After college, Alli moved back to Louisville where she worked for a local handmade bath and body company. It was there she truly learned the importance of being genuine and caring in sales, to not only gain clients but also allow your business to grow authentically and stand out.

Alli moved to Nashville in the summer of 2016 and hasn’t looked back since! Before joining Infinity in August 2021, she worked in boutique management and sales. Although she loves clothes and fashion, she was looking for a change of scenery. Due to her bubbly personality and desire to help and be around people, Alli knew a desk job wouldn't be for her. Nashville quickly proved how "big city, small town" it is, and she found Infinity Hospitality! She has loved the opportunity to meet new people every day and help them find their dream venue for their big event!

When she’s not working, Alli can be found at one of the parks with her poochon named Daisy. If she isn’t with her dog, she’s hanging out with her friends, shopping, enjoying Nashville's great restaurants, or back in Louisville visiting family. No matter where she is, though, she always has candy and snacks in my purse… gotta love purse snacks!
